text: Michael Jackson (March 27, 1942 - August 30, 2007) nicknamed "Beer Hunter" was a famous British writer. He was known for being an expert about beer. It was revealed in December 2006 that Michael Jackson "is and has been suffering for at least a decade from Parkinson's Disease." He also suffered from diabetes.
